Soulstice, post damage. Havoc launched two bombs at Stronghold and Blender, 
and Zardus fired at Stronghold in my last post.

::Zardus/Havoc/Repressor/Bloodystrike/Reptilica::

Zardus dives out of the way of a few autogun shots, landing and firing at 
Stronghold.

He pulls out his sword, noticing Deemos and opening fire on him as well.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Flying over the battlefield, Havoc tries to find a suitable target.  Every 
Mafia member seemed to be being slaughtered or attacked by one or another of 
the Alliance members. He sees Zardus fire at Deemos, smiling internaly.

"WarMachines," he says as he dives at Deemos, his siren screaching as he 
drops a few bombs at the bot, "We combine in one cycle. Get ready."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor recieves Havoc's orders, flying past a few autogun shots, one 
digging into his side.

Seeing the Mafia base's shields go back online, he fires two missiles, them 
along with several dozen rapid fire shots streaming at the shields.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike and Reptilica jump to the side, dozens of shots and a few 
missiles passing by them through the hole through which they were entering 
the Mafia base.

"Take out the rest of the autoguns, then we can go back for a CR." 
Bloodystrike says, aiming at one of the two remaining autoguns and firing, 
from almost point-blank range. Reptilica does the same witht he other one.
